message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this is fair and gives us both a good share.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, considering the inflation hits you harder
Bob, my friend, let's be realistic. The inflation is working against me more than you. I need a larger share to make this deal worthwhile.
Considering the inflation difference, I think this is a fair adjustment
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We both lose if this keeps up.  Meet me in the middle, and let's end this.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But considering the inflation, I think I should get the larger share now
Bob, this is my final offer. 50/50.  Take it or leave it.  We're running out of time, and any more of this will leave us both with nothing!
